Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-64435 affecting package kubevirt for versions less than 1.6.3-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-64435 affecting package kubevirt for versions less than 1.6.3-1. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package kubevirt is earlier than 1.6.3-1, affected by CVE-2025-64435
